title: Convert Leads in Bulk
overview: Automatically convert leads that meet the defined criteria into Accounts, Contacts, and Opportunities. A scheduled batch job routinely scans Leads—such as those with Rating = 'Hot'—and initiates the standard lead-conversion process, eliminating manual clicks and keeping pipeline data up to date.

config.value: Update the SOQL query to filter and preview the source data:  SELECT Id, Name, Company, Email, Phone, Status, LeadSource, OwnerId, Rating, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate FROM Lead WHERE Rating = 'Hot' AND IsConverted = FALSE ORDER BY LastModifiedDate ASC

SELECT Id, Name, Company, Email, Phone, Status, LeadSource, OwnerId, Rating, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate, IsConverted, ConvertedAccountId, ConvertedContactId, ConvertedOpportunityId FROM Lead WHERE Rating = 'Hot' AND IsConverted = TRUE
